## Expectation.toBeAContainerWith() method

Checks if the value is an iterable containing all of the provided items.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toBeAContainerWith(this: Expectation<any>, ...expectedItems: any[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | [Expectation](./earljs.expectation.md)<!-- -->&lt;any&gt; |  |
|  expectedItems | any\[\] | values or matchers to look for in the matched iterable. Order of the items doesn't matter. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
